entities.name: Yao
entities.description: Yao is a technology platform that allows for the creation of admin panels without frontend coding. It uses Table, Form, and API widgets to build applications and employs DSL to describe pages and processes.

entities.name: Admin panel
entities.description: Admin panel is a user interface that allows administrators to manage and control applications or systems. In the context of Yao, it can be created without frontend coding using specific widgets.

entities.name: Table widget
entities.description: Table widget is a component used in Yao to build admin panels. It is part of the technology stack that allows for data handling and presentation.

entities.name: Form widget
entities.description: Form widget is a component used in Yao to build admin panels. It is part of the technology stack that allows for data input and management.

entities.name: API widget
entities.description: API widget is a component used in Yao to build admin panels. It is part of the technology stack that allows for interaction with APIs and data processing.

entities.name: DSL
entities.description: DSL (Domain-Specific Language) is used in Yao to describe pages and processes, making the creation of admin panels more powerful than traditional HTML.

entities.name: Highly Customized UI
entities.description: Highly Customized UI refers to user interfaces that require extensive customization beyond standard templates or components. In Yao, creating such UIs might require custom coding.

relationships.description: Yao uses Table widget as a component to build admin panels.
Yao uses Form widget as a component to build admin panels.
Yao uses API widget as a component to build admin panels.
Yao employs DSL to describe pages and processes, enhancing the power of admin panel creation.
Highly Customized UI may require custom coding, which is not the best fit for Yao's standard capabilities.
